textPlain: I like the idea, I’ve been wandering around soma and mission for a week but not found anyone online

so is itBit ChatorBitch At?And is it somehow connected to bitcoin? This post mentions buying beer in exchange for "sats" so perhaps it is.The entirely-in-lowercase page of the actual project does not clarify any of these questions. Not that they're more than idle curiosity given that the conclusion of this review is "it didn't work".
